required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Better First Aid With First Aid Training and Dispatcher Central Instructions?
clinical_study.official_title: Bedre førstehjelp Med førstehjelpstrening og AMK-veiledning?

brief_summary.textblock:
The study evaluates the effect of a first aid course on first aid skills compared to no training. The study also evaluates the effect of first-aid instructions given by emergency dispatch central over mobile phone on first aid performance to no instructions.
Half the participants will perform first aid in two scenarios prior to first aid training. Half the participants will perform first aid in two scenarios 4 to 5 months after attending a first aid course. Half the participants (overall) will receive first aid instructions by mobile phone during the scenarios.

clinical_study.why_stopped: Could not recruit eligible PhD-candidate to take on the project

primary_outcome.measure: First aid performance after first aid course
primary_outcome.description: First aid performance 4-5 months after first aid course. Measured by a combined score from assigning specific first aid measures a score for being performed.

primary_outcome.measure: First aid performance during first aid instructions by phone
primary_outcome.description: First aid performance. Measured by a combined score from assigning specific first aid measures a score for being performed.

arm_group.arm_group_label: No first aid course, No dipatch instruction
arm_group.description: Participants' first aid skills are tested in two scenarios without prior first aid course and no dispatch instructions during the scenarios

arm_group.arm_group_label: First aid course, No dispatch instructions
arm_group.description: Participants' first aid skills are tested in two scenarios 4 to 5 months after receiving a first aid course and no dispatch instructions during the scenarios
Participants' first aid skills are tested in two scenarios 4 to 5 months after receiving a first aid course and they are given instructions from emergency dispatch by phone during the test scenarios

arm_group.arm_group_label: No first aid course, dispatch instructions
arm_group.description: Participants' first aid skills are tested in two scenarios without prior first aid course, and they are given instructions from emergency dispatch by phone during the test scenarios

intervention.arm_group_label: First aid course, No dispatch instructions

intervention.intervention_name: First aid instructions by mobile phone
intervention.arm_group_label: No first aid course, dispatch instructions

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Students in high school/college
Exclusion Criteria:
